ActCorrections and Conditional Release Act
PrecisAppointment of PETER BRUCE MALCOLM of Belleville, Ontario, to be a part-time member of the Ontario Regional Division of the Parole Board of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a period of three years, effective December 4. 2017.
